title: Web Development
description: We build websites and web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

title: Simple Setup
description: The Shield platform allows users to easily setup and configure their website security.

title: Automatic Integration
description: The Shield platform automatically integrates with your website and web applications.

title: Secured Database
description: The Shield platform includes a secured database for storing your website and web application data.

title: Documentation
description: The Shield platform includes documentation for all of its features and functionality.

title: Cloud Compatibility
description: The Shield platform is compatible with cloud services such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

title: Threat Protection Team
description: The Shield platform includes a team of security experts to protect your website and web applications.

title: Component Based Admin Panel
description: The Shield platform includes an customizable component based admin panel, you only pay for the components you need.
